title: [Boreas Meadows, Levantera Road]
description: A cobblestone street leads off into the meadow, thin blades of grass poking up here and there between the stones.  Narrow paths of flattened grass wind their way through the tall grasses edging the street, leading up to various homes.

A cobblestone street leads off into the meadow, thin blades of grass poking up here and there between the stones.  Narrow paths of flattened grass wind their way through the tall grasses to various homes, illumination from their windows helping to guide the way.
